DOC.brief_summary: A single center , randomize , control , parallel-arm study plan investigate clinical outcome horizontal ridge augmentation simultaneous single implant placement , use newly design Ti-membrane . Twenty-four adult subject fulfill inclusion criterion enrol . They randomly place one two treatment group : customize titanium membrane ( Cti-mem ) collagen membrane ( CM ) group control . The decision material use make implant place . Primary closure surgical site attempt 4 month ( +/- 1 month ) , implant surgically uncovered restore . Outcome analyse perform 1-year crown place , 18 month ( - 1 +4 month ) implant surgery . Clinical radiographic parameter compare two experimental group . The primary outcome linear increase horizontal ridge width direct measurement .
DOC.brief_title: Customized Titanium Membrane Growing Jaw Bone Horizontally
DOC.criteria: Male female , age > 18 Overall good , stable health A single miss mandibular 1st molar least 3 month Any medical condition may contradict implant bone surgery influence outcome ( detailed criterion case report form ) Pregnancy lactate mother Current heavy smoker ( > 10 cigarettes/day ) previous heavy smoker quit less one year Unstable unsuitable oral condition implant bone surgery ( detailed criterion case report form )
